name: Bat Hotel
description:
Bat Hotel is a casual game with agility and role-playing elements. Observe and then discover the movement patterns of different enemies and traps. You will control the movement of a magic perfume bottle to purify evil energy in a hotel attacked by dark forces and help all the hotel guests out of trouble. Press the key as fast as you can!StoryAs the most famous magician in the town, you were assigned to investigate a hotel in the outskirts of town. A group of girls traveling throughout this place wants to have a rest, but they are in trouble now. They need help immediately. Watch out, one of them is the incarnation of evil.Features·The attack speed depends on the speed of your keystrokes.
·8 stages
·Every normal hotel guests have 2 styles of clothing.
·different enemy groups at each level
·an atmosphere of horror
